heading: Libraries
text: R scripts bookdown document require following packages:
code:
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl) 
library(httr)
library(plotly)
library(htmltools)
library(gridExtra)

heading: 3.2 Dissolved Economies
text: Data certain dissolved economies calculated aggregating descendant economies.Example: Czechoslovakia split 1993 Czechia Slovakia. UNCTADÂ requires data Czechoslovakia 1992 separate data since 1993. UNSD contains Czechoslovakia data 1989 separate data since 1990. ETL script sums Czechia Slovakia data years 1990-1992 adds Czechoslovakia label, economy code 200 comment Czechia 203 + Slovakia 703 referring origin values.full list special cases.

heading: Yugoslavia (Former) 1991
text:
Yugoslavia 890 <- Serbia 688 + Montenegro 499 + Croatia 191 + North Macedonia 807
+ Slovenia 705 + Bosnia Herzegovina 070

heading: USSR (Former) 1991
text:
USSR 810 <- Russian Federation 643 + Ukraine 804 + Belarus 112 + Uzbekistan 860 + Kazakhstan 398
+ Georgia 268 + Azerbaijan 031 + Lithuania 440 + Moldova 498 + Latvia 428 + Kyrgyzstan 417
+ Tajikistan 762 + Armenia 051 + Turkmenistan 795 + Estonia 233

heading: Pacific Islands, Trust Territory 1970-1981
text: Pacific Islands, Trust Territory 582 <- Micronesia 583 + Marshall Islands 584 + Palau 585
